title: As a user I want to be prevented from approving a 2nd recert for a date
custom_steps:
Messages: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Submit" on a DL Recertification transaction will check that no approved Recert transaction exists for the player for the Recertification date on the transaction.
* If one already exists, blocking message #88 will display.

title: As a user I want to be able to print a blank 7-Day Concussion Diagnostic Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN "7-Day Concussion Diagnostic Form" appears as an option in the Reporting widget under the Type "Blank Letters".
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting this option will print the proper pdf of the letter.
custom_expected:
THEN The pdf will follow the provided format and details.
AND This story should also cover the replacement of the old form with the new one (See Contour).

title: As a user I want to be able to print a Consent to Continue Rehab at ST Facility Beyond 20 Days letter for a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Consent to Continue Rehab at ST Facility Beyond 20 Days" appears as an option in the Create New menu for players under "Player Letters".
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting this option will print the proper pdf of the letter using the proper information from the player's profile.
custom_expected:
THEN Users will have the ability to alter the Date used for the form. (Should be pre-populated with current date)
AND Users will have the ability to alter the player's name as it will appear on the form. (Should be pre-populated with player's First Last)
AND Users will have the ability to enter the Injury to be populated on the form. 
AND Users will have the ability to enter the Effective Date to be populated on the form. 
AND The form will be generated in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish. 
AND The form will be generated in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish. 
AND The pdf will follow the provided format and details.

title: As a user I want a Return from Rehab to be created when a Waiver Claim Assignment is approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Waiver Claim Assignment is approved, if the player has a MJ or MN Roster status of "Rehab"
custom_steps: WHEN the system will automatically create a "Return from Rehab" transaction for the player.
custom_expected:
THEN If the player is on the MJ League DL, then a MJ League Return from Rehab should be created.
IF the player is on the MN League DL, then a MN League Return from Rehab should be created. 
AND The Return date will = the waiver claim assignment date. 
AND The Return from Rehab will automatically be submitted and approved for the player. Any rules violations will be overridden. 
AND Once the Return from Rehab has been approved, the system will create a Reinstate from DL for the player as laid out in #132788303. 
AND This should only happen once the Waiver Claim Assignment rules have all passed.

title: As a user I want a Reinstate from DL to be created when a Waiver Claim Assignment is approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN  a Waiver Claim Assignment is approved, if the Request Date falls in the MJ League Season and the player has a MJ or MN Roster status of "DL"
custom_steps: WHEN the system will automatically create a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for the player.
custom_expected:
THEN If the player is on the MJ League DL, then a MJ League Reinstate from DL should be created.
IF the player is on the MN League DL, then a MN League Reinstate from DL should be created. 
AND The Reinstatement date will = the waiver claim assignment date. 
AND The Reinstate from DL will automatically be submitted and approved for the player. 
AND This should only happen once the Waiver Claim Assignment rules have all passed.

title: UAT Feedback - CDF checkbox changes
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating a DL placement tx for a concussion
custom_steps:
WHEN:
* The "Received CDF" checkbox present on MJ Concussion Placements should now be "CDF Submitted".
custom_expected:
THEN:
* Club users should NOT be able to check the CDF Submitted checkbox unless a file is attached with the label "Concussion Diagnostic Form" selected. (OK to be accomplished with either an error message or a front-end rule) 
* BOC users should continue to be able to check the CDF Submitted checkbox without a file attached in all states.
